text: Anata gata wa, jinrui ni nokosa reta sairyo no kyodotaidearu. Anata gata wa tadashi koto o meiji, jaakuna koto o kinji, arra o shinpo suru. Keiten'notami mo shinko surunaraba, kare-ra no tame ni don'nani yokatta ka. Daga kare-ra no aru mono wa shinko suruga, daibubun no mono wa arra no okite ni somuku mono-tachidearu
